intro: Megotrys, commonly known as the sacred lotus, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Asia. It belongs to the Nelumbonaceae family and is characterized by its large, showy flowers that bloom on water surfaces. The plant has broad, heart-shaped leaves that float on the water, while its roots are submerged. Megotrys is known for its symbolic significance in various cultures and its use in traditional medicine. Its botanical features make it an important species in aquatic ecosystems.
